metadata.description: AI image generation CLI and Claude Code skill powered by Google Gemini Nano Banana 2. Generate, edit, and transform images with transparent asset support, multi-resolution output, and cost tracking.

plugins.name: nano-banana
plugins.description: Generate AI images from text prompts using Gemini Nano Banana 2. Supports transparent assets, reference images, 512px-4K resolution, 14 aspect ratios, and Flash/Pro model selection.
